This site has not any purposes.. I just started making it when I was really bored, and developed it at my boring moments. But Im really happy that this site has finally reached its 100000th user.. I would therefor thank my neighbours for doing stuff so loudly that i could even hear the details. I adore my primary school teacher because she knew Im gonna be a masterpiece web developer. Im sorry for those ***holes over there who think they and their environment are the best and these Ass**** look down at the rest. As you are reading my blog I would give you a life hint: for non-english-speaking-users, be aware that the word scissors is pronounced 'sizer' not 'skizer'.. I've made this mistake while i was trying to speak in a 'good' accent. Btw stay tuned for more things on this site and I wish you a really good life...
